original_text: And every day Mordecai walked in front of the court of the harem to learn how Esther was and what was happening to her.
korean_text: 모르드개가 날마다 후궁 뜰 앞으로 왕래하며 에스더의 안부와 어떻게 될지를 알고자 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And every day Mordecai walked in front of the court of the harem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모르드개는 매일 후궁의 뜰 앞을 걸었습니다.

sentences.original_text: to learn how Esther was and what was happening to her.
sentences.korean_translation: 에스더가 어떻게 지내는지와 그녀에게 무슨 일이 일어나는지 알아보기 위함이었습니다.
